In Firefox 4.0, the font, font size or font spacing for the bookmarks toolbar has changed causing items which would appear in a window to get pushed off the right side of the window onto the overflow list.



Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.put up a lot of bookmarks in the bookmark toolbar.  In v3.6 they will fit, in v4.0 they will NOT
2.
3.
Actual Results:  
They fit in v3.6 the do NOT FIT in v4.0

Expected Results:  
They should always fit.

You could either put back the original font of spacing or give the user the ability to choose the font or spacing

This is a reduction in usability between v3.6 and v4.0

comments.raw_text:
This is a significant reduction of the usability of the browser.  I used to have a group of useful bookmarks visible in the bookmarks toolbar, now I cannot have as many as I used to.  That is a reduction in usability.

If this change included the ability for the user to adjust the spacing or font-size so that the issue could be self-corrected that would be OK.

Otherwise, this is a solution to a problem that didn't exist.  The old readability was just fine.
